sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import {Card, CardActions,CardContent, CardMedia, Button, Typography} from '@mui/material'; import hanuman from "../Image/hanuman.jpeg" function MovieItem(movie_id,title,description,duration) { return ( <> Lizard Lizards are a widespread group of squamate reptiles, with over 6,000 species, ranging across all continents except Antarctica ) } export default MovieItem
